forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Clearing late. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain or snow showers in the evening will give way to clearing late. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening. A few snow showers late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 38F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
